name: scribble-beasts
description: A web game where players collaboratively create beasts out of scribbles to save the world

scripts.playtest: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.playtest.yml up --build
scripts.playtest:run: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.playtest.yml up --build --wait
scripts.prod: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml down --remove-orphans && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml up --build
scripts.down:playtest: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.playtest.yml down
scripts.create:apps: flyctl apps create scribble-server-jazmo --org scribble-beasts && flyctl apps create scribble-client-jazmo --org scribble-beasts
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:server && npm run deploy:client

author: Jasmine Mogadam
